name: Black Hole Escape (itch)
description:
Black Hole Escape by Savage Storm Games!

A 2D top down shooter.

Kill enemies while avoiding an ever expanding black hole that will damage you over time if you are inside it.

Be aware enemies will get stronger the farther you travel.

Controls
 -move your ship with "W, A, S, D"
 -fire your laser with "right click"
 -charge your laser with "left click"
 -press "1" "2" or "3" to use skills

 -pause the game with "F"
 -restart the game with "R"
